email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. We have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, DWT 150,000, LOA 250m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Can you come down to the low 50s? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your response. I can offer $51.25 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this is acceptable. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.25 is better, but we were hoping for $50.75. Can you match that? Also, can we confirm the laytime is 72 hours? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I can meet you at $50.75 per metric ton. Laytime is confirmed at 72 hours. Please confirm if we can proceed with the fixture. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $50.75 works for us. Let’s proceed with the fixture. Please send over the recap for review. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Fixture Recap - MV Ocean Star
email_chain.body: Hi John, please find the fixture recap attached. Summary: Vessel MV Ocean Star, DWT 150,000, LOA 250m. Cargo: Crude Oil, 140,000 MT. Load Port: Houston, Discharge Port: Rotterdam. Laycan: 15-20 October. Freight: $50.75 per metric ton. Demurrage: $20,000 per day pro rata. Laytime: 72 hours. Please confirm. Best, Sarah
